item.title: lion
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐⭐⭐ SIZE: 6” / 15 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. lion pattern MATERIALS: Light worsted weight yarn in yellow, brown, pink, orange and black (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Safety eyes (9 mm) Yarn needle Pins Stitch markers Fiberfill for stuffing Optional: wire or pipe cleaner hind leg (make 2, start in brown yarn) Rnd 1: start 7 sc in a magic ring [7]
